entry.title: Starting the site
entry.content: Yesterday after some struggling with configuring the environment, I finally got jekyll to work as normal. Now here’s the personal site. There’ll be more contents, when I have time to add them.
entry.summary: Yesterday after some struggling with configuring the environment, I finally got jekyll to work as normal. Now here’s the personal site. There’ll be more contents, when I have time to add them.
